title: Textile And Samples, "Wavy Trellis", 1984
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: Along each side;"WAVY TRELLIS By EDDIE SQUIRES For The Collection DESIGNER'S CHOICE Copyright (Symbol MCMLXXXIV Bt Warner & Sons Limited (arrow) Top".
dimensions:
A. Warp: 406.5 (100in.). Weft: 142.5cm (56in.) B. Warp: 69cm (27 1/4in.) Weft: 71.5cm (28 1/4in.) C. Warp: 69cm (27 1/4in.). Weft: 71.5cm (28 1/4in.) D. Warp:68.5cm (27in.). Weft: 61cm (24in.)
Pattern: Height of repeat: 63.5cm (25in.).
description: Diamond shapes made up of crossing wavy lines on a striped background. A. 3 blues and cream on whits. B. 3 greens and apricot C. 3 greys and yellow D. 3 reds and silver
